main event: A round sphere about half the size of a large airliner was observed traveling NW and then vanished suddenly and silently after about 0.5 to 0.75 minutes.
interesting points: The object traveled straight and banked to the right while moving SE at a very rapid rate of speed., The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes., The object was white and had no visible wings., The observation raises the possibility of a balloon or aircraft due to insufficient data for evaluation., An airliner was reported in the vicinity, possibly intercepting or coinciding with the object's path.
location: 2 Mi SE of Odessa, Florida, USA
